title: A Perfect Ending Plan of the Villain in a Fairy Tale - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Character Growth   Child Abuse   Clever Protagonist   Comedic Undertone   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Obsessive Love   Possessive Characters   Righteous Protagonist   Royalty   Slow Growth at Start   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 피치 파이
description:
The protagonist of a fairy tale whose tears turn into diamonds.

I was possessing… her bad sister.

Three years left until the passing prince fell in love with my younger sister and married, and the family who harassed the protagonist were executed.

‘I’d rather go find the prince and throw in the protagonist and plan a way to live.’

It was nice to find the prince after the twists and turns…

“Please marry me.”

The prince knelt on one knee. In front of me.

Not there? Don’t you have to marry my sister?>
